Welcome to OPSource Documentation

OPSource is a comprehensive trading platform that combines advanced AI/ML capabilities with high-performance trading engines and enterprise integration features.

Components

Anya AI/ML Engine

Advanced AI/ML trading engine with predictive analytics and automated trading strategies.

Anya AI/ML Trading Engine
Dash33 Trading Engine

High-performance trading engine optimized for low latency and high throughput.

Dash33 High-Performance Trading Engine
Enterprise Integration

Tools and APIs for enterprise system integration and customization.

Enterprise Integration
Mobile Platform

Mobile-first trading platform with real-time market data.

Mobile Platform
